name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of extensive experience in developing high-performance software solutions, particularly in distributed systems and backend services. Expert in **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and building robust public-facing APIs. Proven proficiency in maintaining scalable data infrastructures using **DynamoDB**, **ClickHouse**, and **TimescaleDB**. Adept at implementing event-driven architectures utilizing **AWS SQS** and **SNS** for seamless event streaming solutions. Solid understanding of **SOLID Principles**, **Clean Code** practices, and **Domain Driven Design** to ensure quality in software delivery.

Possesses hands-on expertise in leveraging **AI Tools** for enhancing functionalities in applications. Experienced in driving projects that incorporate strategic design patterns and critical thinking, leading to pragmatic problem-solving. Committed to building secure and maintainable solutions in compliance with industry standards. Deep knowledge of CI/CD automation processes and best practices, ensuring timely deployments and system integrity across projects.

experience.responsibilities:

• Developed and maintained distributed systems and data infrastructures that incorporated **ClickHouse**, **TimescaleDB**, and **DynamoDB** for seamless data management and retrieval.
• Architected and deployed microservices utilizing **AWS SQS** and **SNS** to enable event streaming, enhancing system resilience and scalability by **30%**.
• Employed **SOLID Principles** and **Clean Code** practices to maintain high code quality and effective collaboration across teams, resulting in a **25%** reduction in bug rates.
• Engaged in critical thinking and pragmatic problem-solving to troubleshoot and resolve complex system issues, improving operational efficiency within the organization.
• Integrated AI tools into existing frameworks, leveraging tools such as AWS services to enhance functionality, create innovative solutions, and automate processes.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver high-quality software that met business needs, focusing on enhancing user experiences and satisfaction.
• Fostered a culture of knowledge sharing and continuous improvement by conducting code reviews and mentoring junior developers.
• Established testing strategies encompassing unit, integration, and functional tests using industry-standard frameworks, ensuring robust backend systems were delivered with **95%** test coverage.

• Developed and maintained robust **Backend Systems** leveraging **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django) while adhering to **SOLID Principles** and **Clean Code** practices, enhancing the overall reliability and performance of financial applications.
• Spearheaded the design and implementation of scalable **Distributed Systems** by adopting a microservices architecture, which improved processing throughput by **25%** for high-volume transaction systems.

• Established effective **Data Infrastructure** by utilizing **ClickHouse**, **TimescaleDB**, and **DynamoDB** for optimized data storage and retrieval, resulting in faster analytics capabilities and a **30%** reduction in query response times.

• Led the design of real-time transaction monitoring dashboards using **React** (18), **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operational teams with actionable insights that reduced detection times for anomalies by **50%**.

• Developed AI/ML-powered fraud detection systems leveraging **scikit-learn**, and **XGBoost**, utilizing **Azure Machine Learning** to proactively identify and flag suspicious activities, achieving an **80%** accuracy rate in detecting fraudulent transactions.
• Created machine learning pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification with **MLflow** and **Airflow**, enabling real-time decision-making capabilities integrated directly into backend services.
